fields.name: projectID
fields.title: Project ID
fields.description: The identifier for the project that this survey belongs to. Important if more than one survey belongs to the project.

fields.name: projectTitleOrName
fields.title: Project Title/Name
fields.example: Reconnaissance and Targeted survey conducted for Shire of Augusta Margaret River, for the Reconstruction of Cowaramup Bay Road project.

fields.name: purpose
fields.title: Purpose
fields.description: Brief summary of the project which led to the establishment of the dataset. A 1â€“2 sentence description of the aims and objectives of the survey/study/project/data collection. Is the project described part of a larger research activity?

fields.name: surveyMethodURL
fields.title: Survey Method URL
fields.description: A DOI or link to the reference about the survey method, if available.

fields.name: temporalCoverageEndDate
fields.title: Temporal Coverage: End Date
fields.description: The date data collection was completed.
